episodes.title: Cult Leader Eligio Bishop’s 3 Wives Fight To Overturn His Life Sentence | TSR Investigates Updatez
episodes.description:
In March 2024, we investigated and broke down the case of Eligio Bishop, a.k.a. Nature Boy, who was the leader of Carbon Nation, which many believe to be a sex cult based in Atlanta. Bishop was charged and convicted of rape, false imprisonment, and three counts of prohibition on nude or sexually explicit electronic transmissions and is now serving a life sentence. Despite this, in this TSR Update, we spoke to three of his wives, who are ready to fight for him and appeal his case. His primary wife, Queen Malia, claims that all members of Carbon Nation knew about the lifestyle before joining the group. Bishop’s wives also claim that the evidence they presented was not considered in court. 

TSR Investigates explores cold cases and special interest news stories underrepresented in mainstream media.

#NatureBoy #Cult #Atlanta #TSRInvestigatesUpdatez

episodes.title: Nature Boy: Alleged Atlanta Cult Leader Is EXPOSED & Sentenced To Life In Prison | TSR Investigates
episodes.description:
Eligio Bishop, an alleged cult leader also known as “Nature Boy,” has been arrested and charged after gruesome stories of abuse were revealed by his former “followers.” Ex-members of Carbon Nation, an alleged Atlanta-based cult, accused Bishop of rape, false imprisonment, posting explicit videos as a retaliation tactic, and more. Not only are women speaking up, but Bishop’s current wives are also sharing their side of the story and threatening to appeal the court’s decision. What really occurred behind the closed doors of Carbon Nation? The Shade Room investigates…

TSR Investigates explores cold cases and special interest news stories underrepresented in mainstream media.

#CarbonNation #NatureBoy #CultLeader #TSRInvestigates
